Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4

Class StoreOrder

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.StoreOrder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class StoreOrder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
The StoreOrder class implements the Customizable interface and contains a list of all orders of a store.
Author:
Serena Zeng, Jackson Lee
